the living?

-[camera shutter clicks] -Who the cold heart? The vapid soul?

For a while, we thought time was money. Find the time, the money comes with it.

translation.en: Plug into the news cycle,
get the wires raw, nod out on the noise.
Somewhere in the nod, we were dropping cargo.
Somewhere in the nod, we were losing infrastructure,
losing redundant systems,
losing specific gravity.
Weightlessness seemed, at the time, the safer mode.
Weightlessness seemed, at the time, the mode in which we could beat both the clock and the affect itself.

translation.en: But...
I see now that it was not.
I see now that the clock was ticking.

translation.en: a bereavement reaction...
to the leaving of familiar environments.
I see now...
that the environment we were leaving...
was that of feeling rich.
I did not see it then.

sifted for their application to the general condition.

never found any use for going over that stuff.

I don't think it's self-indulgent, self-pitying, or any other damn thing.

You're right. [grunts]

a legislative branch kind of man.

no remainders.

uh, Royale Caribe, InterCon... Ramada. Ramada.

What exactly did you have in Malibu that you don't have now?

The three cars. We had three cars.

translation.en: Fine.
A Jacuzzi, a tennis court, and three cars. Is that your idea of a real life?

translation.en: No.
[Elena] I'm sorry, sweetie, that wasn't... That wasn't what I--

Coco!
[woman] Name tag? Happy Fourth of July. Name tag?
Happy Fourth of July.
Happy Fourth of July.

-Yes, ma'am. -So I can speak to someone now.
No, ma'am, there are no appointments today.
But I wouldn't need an appointment to just speak to someone at the picnic, right?

Fine, fine.

Too late now.
Is that a last meal?

Read any news today?

Fascinating.
You ready to go on record with any of that, Mr. Morrison?

Well, my usual target's been out of touch, but I hear she's-- Is it normal for you to be a step behind?

Wasn't that your entire thesis at last year's presentation to the Council on Foreign Relations?

translation.en: Did you cover that?

translation.de: -Sie berichteten darüber? -Und über vieles anderes, bevor ich die Recherche einstellen und dem Zirkus hinterherlaufen musste,

I took his place on a ghost plane out of Fort Lauderdale on June 29th,

No payday.
No protection. No plan.
Just a game no one let me in on.

translation.en: A secret war.
Now I got a passport with a trick built into it and no ticket home.

translation.en: [Treat] That I know.

Stayed for the scoop. Nice try.

All right.
I don't know why I came.

[breathes raggedly] I was losing...
momentum on Catherine, my daughter.

walked away from this...
I would just...
I would just walk away from everything. I would just...

And all I want to know...
is what you're doing here.
What you're doing in the picture.

if not stirring the pot?

[Elena] I thought you were the one.

Something,

Alcestis.
Back from the tunnel and half in love with death.

Tomorrow what?
Tomorrow we leave.

He's a half-crazy old man in a sick season.

Who would miss him?
Who would care?
You?
File closed.

The only trick of the passport was to keep you in play.

Dick is dead.
I know.

Okay? I don't have a name yet,

-I was there. -[Alma] I know.
I know. Look, we're all over it down here. But you should be safe for now.

Two birds, one stone. The file closes.

The date on my bogus passport's the same day Dick died.

Listen. Just stay where you are for now.

You showed up instead.
[Alma] Hello?Elena?
Elena? Hello?
There are two things I need you to know right away.

translation.en: The first thing I need you to know is that you get to go back to Malibu.
translation.de: Das Erste ist, dass du nach Malibu zurückgehst.

translation.en: Your dad's coming to pick you up.
Do not go with anyone except your dad. Do you understand?

is that I love you.
Sometimes... [inhales] we argue and... about things, but I...

I only argue because I want your life to be happy and good.
translation.de: ...dass ich nur streite, weil ich will, dass du glücklich bist.

Not to waste your talent.
Not to let who you are get mixed up with anyone else's idea of who you should be.

translation.en: I know you're nodding.
I love you the most. You're my Kit-Cat.
translation.de: Ich liebe dich über alles, meine Kit-Cat.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay. Everything's set. A car will take you.

routinely,

translation.en: so you don't need to worry about that. But just, you know...

translation.en: Isn't this lovely?
What could be lovelier?
Take the day. Get settled in.
translation.de: Nehmen Sie heute frei. Richten Sie sich ein.

translation.en: Oh, and, uh... be kind to the generator.
translation.de: Und gehen Sie sparsam mit dem Strom um.

translation.en: We need lights, but not every day.
translation.de: Wir brauchen Licht, aber nicht täglich.

translation.en: I only do the petrol run once a week and I want to keep it that way.
translation.de: Ich hole nur einmal die Woche Benzin, so soll es auch bleiben.

translation.en: [Paul] Elise, happy hour!
Coming!
[Paul] Happy, happy hour.
[Paul] It was complicated. I could tell you stories.
translation.de: Es war kompliziert. Ich könnte Geschichten erzählen.

translation.en: -[Elena chuckles] No. -I'm not gonna say any names, but...
translation.de: Ich werde keine Namen nennen, aber...

translation.en: if I did tell you the names,
-you'd recognize every single one of them. -[laughs]
And then, there was Haiti,
which I adored.
I was mostly single there, of course.
translation.de: Da war ich meist natürlich Single.

translation.en: Just a man about town.
I ran the first, and...
for all I care to know, the only
translation.de: ...soweit ich weiß das einzige erstklassige Badehaus für Schwule

translation.en: first-rate gay bathhouse in all of Port-au-Prince.
translation.de: ...soweit ich weiß das einzige erstklassige Badehaus für Schwule in ganz Port-au-Prince.

translation.en: And again, no names,
but my patrons were some of the most major operators on Wall Street,
translation.de: ...aber zu meinen Gönnern gehörten die wichtigsten Wall-Street-Giganten

translation.en: the hottest of the hot, motion picture,
and agents and executives. I mean, the biggest.
translation.de: Agenten und Führungskräfte, wirklich die größten.

translation.en: Of all the places, you know?
I feel like that...
could have been the place.
translation.de: ...hätte der Ort für mich sein können.

translation.en: But then I got scared away when dead chickens started showing up on my gate.
translation.de: Doch ich wurde abgeschreckt, als tote Hühner an meinem Tor auftauchten.

translation.en: I mean, I may not be the smartest Nellie on the block,
translation.de: Ich bin vielleicht nicht der klügste Schwuli,

translation.en: but, hey, when I see a dead chicken, I know what it means.
translation.de: aber wenn ich ein totes Huhn sehe, weiß ich, was das heißt.

translation.en: I know how to take a hint. Pas de poulet.
translation.de: Ich verstehe einen Wink. Pas de poulet.

translation.en: Pas de Port-au-Prince,
so I ended up here.
Bob set me up.
We did a great business.
Every room was filled every single weekend.
translation.de: Die Zimmer waren jedes Wochenende ausgebucht.

translation.en: And for a while, we ran a beautiful trade with the European set.
translation.de: Eine Zeit lang machten wir wunderbare Geschäfte mit den Europäern.

translation.en: But then, a few neighbor-island coups and bombings later,
translation.de: Nach Bombenangriffen und Putschen auf Nachbarinseln

translation.en: it trickled down to the backpackers, and then...
translation.de: kamen nur noch Rucksacktouristen und dann...

translation.en: several State Department warnings later, and we were down to this.
translation.de: ...nach einigen Reisewarnungen des Außenministeriums waren wir das hier.

translation.en: So, why did you stay?
Why are you still here?
I could ask you the same question.
But me, I...
I guess I stayed because I have a very,
translation.de: ...ich glaube, ich blieb, weil ich eine sehr...

translation.en: very high tolerance for pleasure.
translation.de: ...sehr hohe Toleranz für den Genuss habe.

translation.en: Tell Evelina to set the table for three tonight.
translation.de: Sagen Sie Evelina, sie soll den Tisch für drei decken.

translation.en: My friend is coming.
Who's that?
My friend. The one I told you about?
translation.de: Mein Freund. Von dem ich Ihnen erzählte.

translation.en: No.
The other friend.
Be a dear, fetch me a refill.
translation.de: Seien Sie so lieb und füllen nach.

translation.en: [Paul] I mean, it's not like the vacancy sign
translation.de: Es ist nicht so, dass sich das Leuchtschild nicht auf meine Stromkosten auswirkt.

translation.en: isn't burning a hole in my electric bill or anything.
translation.de: dass sich das Leuchtschild nicht auf meine Stromkosten auswirkt.

translation.en: Like I keep telling you, there's people I know who can help you.
translation.de: Wie gesagt, ich kenne Leute, die dir helfen können.

translation.en: People we've met here in the past.
translation.de: Leute, die wir hier getroffen haben.

translation.en: I say, sure, take a room.
translation.de: Ich sage, klar, nimm ein Zimmer.

translation.en: Fill it with whatever on earth you want.
translation.de: Füll es mit was immer du willst.

translation.en: Rum punch?
Be a dear, leave it on the side, Elena.
translation.de: Sei so gut und stell ihn ab.

translation.en: Move it in, move it out, who cares?
translation.de: Steck es rein, nimm es raus, wen kümmert's?

translation.en: Just cut me in.
Drop me a bit of this Colombian jet fuel from weekend to weekend and I'll be sweet.
translation.de: Ich bin glücklich, wenn du mir ab und zu kolumbianisches Kerosin bringst.

translation.en: We've done this before. [stammering] I told you...
translation.de: Das hatten wir schon, ich sagte dir...

translation.en: ...here in the past.
I can create your future for you.
translation.de: Ich kann dir eine Zukunft erschaffen.

translation.en: [Paul] Elise!
[yells] Elise!
Oh, fuck it.
Wipe the chairs, Elise.
[Treat] If anything happens, don't come to me. It's not safe for you here anymore.
translation.de: Geht es schief, komm nicht zu mir. Es ist zu gefährlich.

translation.en: I'll come to you.
[Weir] Does she know something?
-Did you tell her something? -[Paul] Of course I didn't tell her.
translation.de: Haben Sie ihr was gesagt? Natürlich nicht.

translation.en: Don't do it the hard way.
You could ride the cattle right through the fence.
translation.de: Treiben Sie das Vieh direkt durch den Zaun.

translation.en: ...driving the cattle through the goddamn fence.
translation.de: ...treibst das Vieh durch den scheiß Zaun.

translation.en: You just missed my partner. You know him, Epperson.
translation.de: Du hast meinen Partner knapp verpasst, Epperson.

translation.en: -[Elena] I don't know him. -[Dick] Yeah, you do. You remember.
Hey, Maxie.
translation.de: Hey, Maxie, schmeiß den Grill an und mach was zu Essen.

translation.en: -Make with the grill and lay on some chow. -Hey, Ellie.
translation.de: Hey, Maxie, schmeiß den Grill an und mach was zu Essen. Hey, Ellie.

translation.en: The sparks won't burn you because... they're cold.
translation.de: Die Funken verbrennen dich nicht, weil sie kalt sind.

translation.en: [Alma] Epperson. Like he doesn't exist.
translation.de: Epperson. Als gäbe es ihn nicht.

translation.en: -A guy named Bob Weir did come up. -[fireworks exploding]
translation.de: Wir sind auf einen Typen namens Bob Weir gestoßen.

translation.en: Bob set me up.
[Alma] When he does show up, it's usually the end of something, not the beginning.
translation.de: Er kreuzt dann auf, wenn etwas endet, nicht wenn es beginnt.

translation.en: [Paul] Elise?
Is that you?
She'll be back up later.
He's there.
Oh, fuck. Come in.
[Elena] Out beyond the ocean.
All salt-heavy and thick with fish.
What do think's out there?
[Treat] Suppose there's nothing out there, actually. No there.

translation.en: Plane will be there at eight o'clock tomorrow.

translation.de: Das Flugzeug kommt morgen um 8 Uhr. Ein unmarkiertes Boot bringt dich. Ist unseres, du bist sicher.

translation.en: I'm gonna stay a few days till everything levels out, clear some smoke.
translation.de: Ich bleibe noch, bis sich der Rauch verzogen hat.

translation.de: Sagte der Geheimagent, als er sich in die Flammen stürzte.

translation.en: Easy Rider of the geopolitic,
too cool for the press pool.
Stop. True reporter.
Pure spin.
Pick you up at the cove by the Surfrider at 6:00.
translation.de: Ich hole dich um 6 Uhr an der Bucht am Surfrider ab.

translation.en: Make sure you have your notes and the film. Otherwise it's all fucked anyway.

translation.en: Unless you think they already found them and it's too late.

translation.en: No, I stashed them.
Good.

translation.de: Ich versuche, vor Schulbeginn daheim zu sein.

[Elena] Home wherever you are, Cat.
I'll call you tomorrow before I get on the plane.

I'll be there.

translation.en: [Elena] Some real things have happened lately.
translation.de: In letzter Zeit sind ernste Dinge passiert.

translation.en: [Elena] First, I wanted to know who.
Who chose money over life?
translation.de: Wer zog das Geld dem Leben vor?

translation.en: Steel and lead over blood and spirit?
translation.de: Stahl und Blei dem Blut und Geist?

translation.en: Who the war pig?
Who the profiteer?
Who the cold heart, the vapid soul?
translation.de: Wer hatte das kalte Herz, die leere Seele?

translation.en: [Treat] Elena!
[Elena] And second...
Second, I wanted to know why.
[Treat] Tomorrow.
[Elena] Tomorrow what? Tomorrow we leave.
[Treat] The suspect then wheeled on me,
pulling a firearm...
wounding me in the shoulder.
I returned fire...
in course, killing her.
I think... [sighs]
I think she knew she was caught.
translation.de: Sie wusste, dass sie entlarvt wurde.

translation.en: You know...
you think you have it covered,
translation.de: Man meint, man habe es im Griff.

translation.en: and find out you don't have it covered worth a goddamn.
translation.de: Und merkt, dass man rein gar nichts im Griff hat.

translation.en: It added all up, but...
it won't bring her back.
[Jones speaking French] Elise Meyer.
Alleged assassin.
Reporter.
American.
Mother. Daughter.
Sandinista sympathizer.
[speaking French] Unfortunately, our initial attempt at interception...
[in English] This way, please.
[in French] ...was unsuccessful.
[Jones speaking French] Some would say she was waiting for a payday.
translation.de: Manche würden sagen, sie wartete auf den Zahltag.

translation.en: Some would say she was caught in the glare.
translation.de: Andere, dass sie vom Schein gebannt wurde.

translation.en: I think Elena McMahon got caught in the glare.
translation.de: Ich glaube, ElenaMcMahon wurde vom Schein gebannt.

translation.en: The water was over her head.
translation.de: Das Wasser stand ihr bis zum Halse.

translation.en: I think she realized what she had been set up to do only in however many seconds there were
translation.de: Ich glaube, sie durchschaute das Ganze erst in den wenigen Sekunden

translation.en: between the time she registered Morrison on the bluff...
translation.de: ab dem Moment, als sie Morrison an der Klippe sah...

translation.en: and when he pulled the trigger.
[man] Why'd she do it?
I don't have an answer for that kind of tragedy.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Erklärung für diese Tragödie.

translation.en: The truth is, it's just a hell of a bad outcome.
translation.de: Es ist ein verdammt schlechter Ausgang.

translation.en: The last outcome you would ever have wanted.
translation.de: Der letzte, den man sich wünschen würde.

translation.en: [Elena] Some real things have happened lately.
translation.de: In letzter Zeit sind ernste Dinge passiert.

translation.en: But we were moving fast.
We were traveling light.
We were younger.
I was younger.
"All part of...
history's rough draft," we used to say.
translation.de: ...Teil des Entwurfs der Geschichte, sagten wir immer.

translation.en: History's footnote.
And yet...
Still...
